major_diseases.symptoms: Diamond-shaped lesions on leaves, neck rot, panicle blast
major_diseases.preventive_measures: Use resistant varieties, avoid excess nitrogen, maintain proper spacing

major_diseases.symptoms: Water-soaked lesions, yellowing of leaf margins, kresek phase
major_diseases.preventive_measures: Use disease-free seeds, avoid deep water, balanced fertilization

major_diseases.symptoms: Elliptical or irregular greenish-grey spots on leaf sheaths
major_diseases.preventive_measures: Proper water management, remove infected plant debris

fertilizer_schedule.application_method: Side dressing at knee high stage

major_diseases.symptoms: Long cigar-shaped necrotic lesions on leaves
major_diseases.preventive_measures: Use resistant varieties, crop rotation, destroy infected debris

major_diseases.symptoms: Small tan-colored lesions with reddish-brown margins
major_diseases.preventive_measures: Balanced nutrition, avoid water stress, use certified seeds

major_diseases.symptoms: Stalk becomes soft, discolored pith, lodging
major_diseases.preventive_measures: Maintain plant population, ensure adequate potash, timely harvest

fertilizer_schedule.application_method: Side dressing at knee high stage

fertilizer_schedule.dosage_per_acre: 5 kg FeSO4 + 2.5 kg ZnSO4 in 200 liters water

major_diseases.causal_organism: Fusarium spp., Curvularia spp., Alternaria spp.
major_diseases.symptoms: Discoloration of grains, moldy appearance, reduced grain quality
major_diseases.preventive_measures: Use resistant varieties, avoid late sowing, timely harvest

major_diseases.symptoms: Premature death, silvery grey appearance of stem, black sclerotia
major_diseases.preventive_measures: Deep summer ploughing, crop rotation, avoid water stress

major_diseases.symptoms: Long elliptical tan-colored lesions on leaves
major_diseases.preventive_measures: Proper spacing, balanced fertilization, resistant varieties

major_diseases.symptoms: Chlorotic streaks, excessive tillering, malformed earheads
major_diseases.preventive_measures: Roguing of diseased plants, use resistant hybrids, seed treatment
major_diseases.recommended_chemical: Metalaxyl 35% WS (seed treatment) or Mancozeb 75% WP (foliar)

major_diseases.symptoms: Honeydew droplets on earhead, hard black sclerotia replacing grains
major_diseases.preventive_measures: Remove ergot bodies before sowing, avoid late sowing

major_diseases.symptoms: Elliptical to spindle-shaped spots on leaves, neck blast
major_diseases.preventive_measures: Balanced fertilization, avoid excess nitrogen, resistant varieties

major_diseases.symptoms: Spindle-shaped lesions on leaves, neck and finger blast
major_diseases.preventive_measures: Use resistant varieties, avoid excess nitrogen, proper spacing

major_diseases.symptoms: Brown oval spots with yellow halo on leaves
major_diseases.preventive_measures: Seed treatment, balanced nutrition, timely sowing

major_diseases.symptoms: Rotting of lower stem, white mycelial growth, sclerotia formation
major_diseases.preventive_measures: Deep summer ploughing, crop rotation, avoid water logging

fertilizer_schedule.dosage_per_acre: 200 g Rhizobium + 200 g PSB per 30 kg seed

major_diseases.causal_organism: Mung bean yellow mosaic virus (vector: Whitefly)
major_diseases.symptoms: Yellow mosaic pattern on leaves, stunted growth, reduced pod formation
major_diseases.preventive_measures: Control whitefly population, use resistant varieties, remove infected plants

major_diseases.symptoms: Small tan to dark reddish-brown pustules on leaves
major_diseases.preventive_measures: Proper spacing, timely sowing, field sanitation

major_diseases.symptoms: Dark brown to black lesions on pods, stems and leaves
major_diseases.preventive_measures: Seed treatment, crop rotation, avoid overhead irrigation

fertilizer_schedule.dosage_per_acre: 2 kg NPK + 200 g Borax in 200 liters water

major_diseases.disease_name: Tikka Disease (Early and Late Leaf Spot)
major_diseases.symptoms: Circular brown spots with yellow halo, premature defoliation
major_diseases.preventive_measures: Use resistant varieties, crop rotation, proper spacing

major_diseases.symptoms: Blackening of collar region, wilting, plant death
major_diseases.preventive_measures: Seed treatment, avoid deep sowing, proper drainage

major_diseases.symptoms: Orange-brown pustules on lower leaf surface
major_diseases.preventive_measures: Timely sowing, balanced fertilization, field sanitation

major_diseases.symptoms: Angular water-soaked lesions, black arm symptoms, boll rot
major_diseases.preventive_measures: Use disease-free seeds, crop rotation, avoid overhead irrigation

major_diseases.symptoms: Circular brown spots with concentric rings on leaves
major_diseases.preventive_measures: Proper spacing, balanced nutrition, remove infected leaves

major_diseases.symptoms: Yellowing and drooping of leaves, vascular browning, plant death
major_diseases.preventive_measures: Use resistant varieties, crop rotation, seed treatment
major_diseases.dosage_per_liter: 2 g/kg seed, 2 g/liter for soil drenching

major_diseases.causal_organism: Pigeonpea sterility mosaic virus (vector: Eriophyid mite)
major_diseases.symptoms: Mosaic pattern, excessive vegetative growth, no flowering
major_diseases.preventive_measures: Rogue out diseased plants, control mite vectors, use resistant varieties
major_diseases.recommended_chemical: Dicofol 18.5% EC or Propargite 57% EC (mite control)

major_diseases.symptoms: Water-soaked lesions on stem, wilting, seedling mortality
major_diseases.preventive_measures: Proper drainage, avoid water logging, seed treatment

major_diseases.causal_organism: Mung bean yellow mosaic virus (vector: Whitefly)

major_diseases.preventive_measures: Seed treatment, crop rotation, field sanitation

name: Sugarcane

fertilizer_schedule.application_method: Side dressing at grand growth phase

major_diseases.preventive_measures: Use disease-free setts, rogue out diseased shoots, resistant varieties

major_diseases.symptoms: Yellowing of leaves, drying from tips, stunted growth
major_diseases.preventive_measures: Proper drainage, resistant varieties, sett treatment
